author: Lee126
title: Loved this hotel!
text:
We have stayed in many hotels in Paris (as well as rental apartments). The Scribe is just lovely and the location is great. It is one of my favorites.
We prefer staying in the 1st for touring and shopping...ease of walking almost everywhere.
The staff is just the best; bed was very comfy; wonderful linens. Bathroom was immaculate. ( loved the Hermes bathroom soap, lotions). Oh, lobby bar was cozy and welcoming. In room Keurig...buffet breakfast on the lowest level was fine.
We could not have been more pleased.
